author: chuck Sa
comment: $9 for the app after 7 DAY TRIAL. Okay app but way far from the price asking.

author: Rüdiger Lehnardt
comment: The only app that works for an avr 600

author: Orlando Ortega
comment: It works! Denon apps didn't.

author: Cannon Rogers
comment: Only app that worked for my AVR

author: Willard Pearson
comment: Does not see my devices at all, just takes up space in my phones memory, app does not work at all, a fake app.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It doesn't use much memory and it isn't fake app. This app is for controlling multiple devices on your home network. Which devices do you have, what are the makes and models. Please email info@myav.co.uk for support/

author: Brian B
comment: App works but the short term and pay to use is moot when others have equally good 3rd party apps for free.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: MyAV can control other smart devices too, not just Denon/Marantz.

author: Felix Riley
comment: I have a Huawei. I've paid £5.99 and this app does nothing, no buttons react at all. It's literally useless. I will chase for a refund.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please can you contact us info@myav.co.uk for support.

title: Doesn't function at all

author: Michael Caley
comment: Crash multiple times on setup doesnt work on galaxy s5
title: Does not work

author: Dalton O
comment: Works great on my Galaxy S5. I use the IR Device in this app for my Denon AVR-590 Reciever. It did exactly what I need it to do, it opens the menu and allows me to select my surround sound settings. This is an awesome replacement, since the used remote that came with the Reciever is partly damaged from the previous user leaving old batteries in it that leaked acid and ate at part of the remote board, and I really didn't want to pay $70 for a used, rare to find remote (RC-1120). Thank you so much.
title: Awesome App for AVR590

author: Musa Ali
comment: Installed this, but was a bit disappointed  as this app doesn't seems to work with my Denon AVR 3803

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: The AVR3803 cannot be controlled over Wi-Fi as it doesn't have a network connection. MyAV should be able to control it via IR though using the IR blaster at the top of you Note 3, to do this please go into the settings of MyAV and add an IR devices>AVR>Denon

author: Sarah Hinchey
comment: After I play the radio in zone 2 it freezes and none of the buttons work.
title: Can't get off Tuner

author: Jonny Knowles
comment: Why do you require access to photo and media files for a remote control app? It was mediocre but now it's uninstalled!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: This is to enable the backup of settings... namely IR codes that you learn yourself (3rd party IR blaster and the HTC M8). You can then reload them on another device or if you need to reinstall MyAV for any reason.

author: HAROLD ADEY
comment: It's great app ,works well with my Marantz 5008 , but 10 dollars to use it ,good luck getting people to pay that. If it's 10 dollars a year I might.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It's $9 for good, there's no ongoing fee for support. It also can control more than just your Marantz

author: Hiddo Netto
comment: Nice, but can it control more functions for the AVR 4806I !

author: Michael Ontiveroz
comment: Be nice if a frequency direct numeric pad was included when selecting tuner.
title: Nice app

author: The IndictedOne
comment: I have an older Denon 2800 AVR that no longer has a remote to it. Bad design on Denon's part requires you only be able to access the systems initial setup with the remote. This where you would go to activate or turn on the subwoofer pre-out and simular settings. I have bought couple universal remotes but it seemed like the only ones that were goin to work were gonna cost me $65+ dollars. Lot of money to gain access to one button! "System setup" Well i came across this app and it got the job done! Thanks!!
title: Best App Period

author: Quintin Giesbrecht
comment: I have an avrs700w it works with the official app, bit but with this one - it won't find it, won't even recognize it when I manually enter ip... Would love to use it, but no dice here.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Please could you email us info@myav.co.uk, as we'd like to find out why your receiver isn't been automatically detected.

title: Does not find my avr

author: ming lu
comment: I lost remote of my sr6009. This is the only app I found supporting ok button and arrow buttons. Thanks
title: Works

comment: So far it works with the basics.
title: Av app for denon

author: Bruce Bolduc
comment: All the functions I need work perfectly
title: Denon 3805 works great

author: FFR 818s
comment: Lost my remote and none of the other apps would work the way i wanted. This worked perfectly. Saved me from buying a new remote. Thanks!
title: Saved me $$

author: Paul Meyer
comment: I lost my remote for my denon amp this app works great. They just updated and added some more features (thanks:D). Definitely worth the money.
title: Updated

author: vinny olito Camp Ruff Ruff
comment: Was totally surprised just downloaded opened and it just worked. Was surprised :)  note 4
title: Randomly picked this from ratings

author: Pim van der Loos
comment: Works great on the Denon AVR 1513, even though it's not listed

author: ravi verma
comment: Works well. Denon 4810

author: Saji Gill
comment: This app Saved my money buying new remote. Its amazing
title: Amazing

author: Francelis Padilla
comment: Very good

author: shane mahan
comment: Was skeptical at first but it actually works
title: Works

author: Barry Lloyd
comment: After trying various apps to control my Denon amp, I tried this one and found it easy to use. I can now connect to my Windows music library and stream my music with ease - great app!
title: Does the job well

author: Arthur Johnson
comment: Works great with my Denon receiver...easy to access most functions and well worth the money...BUT... and maybe its a user issue... It wont retain the connection with my receiver after I turn the receiver off. Many times I have  do a force stop for it to recognize and connect with the receiver again. Im sure this isnt normal. Whats the issue?

author: Rashed Chowdhury
comment: Just like my title says , it's not for free but a trial version . It expires after a while and then you get the massage saying you have to pay 9.99 $ to continue to use the app !!!!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It says this in the description

title: It's not for free !!!

author: Lawrence Case
comment: Wouldn't work on my old phone so I uninstalled it.  Tried to install on my new phone and it says trial period is over.  The App is listed as free.  Don't know if it works on my new phone.....

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It's a free trial version. It says this in the description.

title: False advertising

author: Darren Messick
comment: I liked this app alot until it got an update and now the only thing that works is the power button and the volume. I can't go into the menu to adjust any settings

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: It looks like this is an issue with a 3rd party firmware installed on the phone interfering with the IR timing. With the stock Samsung firmware it should work with the S5.

title: Avr-3803

author: Willie Vermeulen
comment: Works well, however after install random popups of games and adds started bugging my Galaxy note 4

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: MyAV doesn't contain any adverts or popups as it's a paid for app. The popups you are getting must be from other software that you have installed.

author: Antonio Šerić
comment: please fix UI for nexus 5! All is too small i have only 3 buttons in zone1. (can't scroll)  it is very hard to press or see any button.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: We have tested MyAV with the Nexus 5. They willl be too small on a mobile so please go to settings and slide down, then choose auto or vertical mode. Please email us info@myav.co.uk if you don't understand.

title: not showing ok

author: Terry Celestin
comment: Nice app... But pricey.

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content: Thanks for the review, MyAV doesn't just control Denon it can control other devices too.

comment: Does not work!

reply.author: Pocketwood
reply.content:
Which Denon or Marantz receiver do you have?
Please contact us info@myav.co.uk.

author: Ron Manlangi
comment: Thanks to this app. Works perfectly to my system.
title: Easy to use

author: Paul Finlay
comment: Excellent control app!
